name: EU Mining Employee Training Digital Transformation Decision
description: Strategic decision for implementing comprehensive digital skills training program for mining workforce transitioning to Industry 4.0 technologies

decision_context.trigger: Industry 4.0 adoption requiring upskilling of 60% of mining workforce in automation, data analytics, and digital safety systems
objectives: Reduce safety incidents through technology adoption
constraints: EU regulatory requirements for worker training
decision_context.timeline: Program launch within 6 months, full implementation over 36 months

stakeholders.interests: Operational efficiency, productivity gains, regulatory compliance
Production continuity, technology adoption, safety improvements
Cost control, ROI measurement, budget allocation
Technology integration, system compatibility, cybersecurity training
Worker safety, incident reduction, compliance training
stakeholders.position: Strong support for safety technology training

stakeholders.interests: Worker rights, fair training access, job security

alternatives.name: Comprehensive Digital Academy
alternatives.description: Build dedicated training facility with full-time instructors, VR simulation labs, and personalized learning paths for all digital technologies

alternatives.name: Blended Learning Platform
alternatives.description: Implement online learning platform combined with hands-on workshops, supplemented by external certification programs

alternatives.name: Partnership-Based Program
alternatives.description: Partner with technical universities and equipment vendors for specialized training programs with on-site certification

recommendation.rationale: Provides comprehensive digital skills training with flexible delivery options, balancing cost-effectiveness with learning outcomes. Allows for scalable implementation across multiple sites while meeting EU regulatory requirements for worker training.
expected_outcomes: 85% of workforce digitally competent within 3 years
Full compliance with EU mining regulations

implementation_plan.phase_2: Full rollout with regional training centers (Months 7-24)

risk_mitigation: Pilot program in one location before full rollout
Partnership with equipment vendors for practical training

outcome_tracking.success_criteria: All KPIs achieved within 15% of targets
